bug.summary: Improve color initial state and selection
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Enhancement</denchmark-h>
Non selected colors keep changing, colors should be initialized by default at dashboard creation to persist the state. Changing colors stop immediately at the first interaction because the state changes, we need to provide the user a button to save the color choice to enable smooth color selection. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/81209591-04d18c00-8fd1-11ea-98d8-078f1870060e.png></denchmark-link>
